Direct Item Hints.Trombone: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING IN DK ISLES WITH ANY KONG FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Bongos: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING IN ANGRY AZTEC WITH CHUNKY FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Monkeyport: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING IN ANGRY AZTEC WITH DIDDY FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Gorilla Gone: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING IN FUNGI FOREST WITH DIDDY FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Saxophone: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING IN FUNGI FOREST WITH DIDDY FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Triangle: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING FOR SHOPS IN ANGRY AZTEC FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Guitar: YOU WOULD BE BETTER OFF LOOKING FOR SHOPS IN FRANTIC FACTORY FOR THIS.
Direct Item Hints.Progressive Slam: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN! IT APPEARS THAT ONE FIGHTER HAS COME UNEQUIPPED TO PROPERLY HANDLE THIS REPTILLIAN BEAST. PERHAPS THEY SHOULD HAVE LOOKED IN FUNGI FOREST OR CRYSTAL CAVES FOR THE ELUSIVE SLAM.

Wrinkly Hints.First Time Talk: WELCOME TO THE DONKEY KONG 64 RANDOMIZER. MADE BY 2DOS, BALLAAM, KILLKLLI, SHADOWSHINE, CFOX, BISMUTH AND ZNERNICUS
